GSD.product_version: versions from v4.5 to before v5.4.181
GSD.description:
libsubcmd: Fix use-after-free for realloc(..., 0)

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.181 by commit aca7e5b6a5008dcf551516490b0ba4510e073d08, it was introduced in version v4.5 by commit 2f4ce5ec1d447beb42143a9653716a2ab025161e. For more details please see the references link.
